title: Exquisite Floral Pink Sapphire Diamond Jhumkas
materials: Crafted in high-quality metal with a lustrous finish. Adorned with round brilliant cut diamonds and oval cut pink sapphires
weighing a total of 15.68 carats (22 pcs).
features: Features a floral inspired design with pink sapphire centerstones surrounded by a radiating halo of diamonds. The intricate metalwork adds a touch of sophistication to the classic Jhumka silhouette.
occasions: and special celebrations. Elevates both traditional sarees and modern attire.
description: A stunning fusion of contemporary design and classic South Indian elegance. These Jhumkas showcase exceptional craftsmanship and radiant gemstones, making them a timeless addition to any jewelry collection.
